SELECT prdt_code, prdt_name, prdt_mainimg, brand_name, updt_date, TO_CHAR(prdt_price,'999,999,999,999')||'￦' AS prdt_price, prdt_categori, brand_id, prdt_inventory, prdt_salecnt, pl.sale_code, sl.sale_count FROM product_list pl left join sale_list sl on pl.sale_code = sl.sale_code and sale_period > now() where 0=0
and brand_id = #{brandId}::uuid
and prdt_name = #{prdtNm}::uuid
and prdt_categori like '%'||#{prdtCategori}||'%'::uuid
and updt_date >= (current_timestamp + '-2 months')
order by updt_date desc
order by prdt_price desc
order by prdt_price asc
order by prdt_salecnt desc

select prdt_code, prdt_name, prdt_mainimg, brand_name, updt_date, TO_CHAR(prdt_price,'999,999,999,999')||'￦' AS prdt_price, prdt_detailimg, prdt_categori, prdt_option, brand_id, prdt_inventory, prdt_salecnt, pl.sale_code, sl.sale_count from product_list pl left join sale_list sl on pl.sale_code = sl.sale_code and sale_period > now() where prdt_code = #{prdtCode}::uuid
select brand_id, brand_name, brand_detail from brand_list where brand_id = #{brandNm}
